sections.heading: 1430.1 through 1430.41 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Group Homes for Persons with Developmental or Physical Disabilities Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1987, c. 225, ยง 1, eff. July 1, 1987. Amended by Laws 1996, c. 155, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1996; Laws 1996, c. 354, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1996. R
